Job Title: Estimator - Commercial Construction

Location: Englewood, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Are you looking to take the next step in your career as a construction Estimator? Do you enjoy working with an amazing team to solve construction challenges? Do you want to work for an organization where everyone knows each other AND enjoys spending time together, whether it is a BBQ, cornhole tournament, golf outing, axe throwing, or just happy hour? Then WE are looking for YOU! 
WCG Construction believes inspired teams rely on each other to find solutions and share in project successes. We aspire to be Colorado’s construction leader with a diverse, customer-centric workforce that thrives while supporting our local communities.  WCG truly values our employees, and we offer an innovative, high energy work environment and a competitive salary with a full benefit package that includes Medical * Dental * Vision * Disability * Life * 401k with company-match * wellness program * PTO and Holidays * HSA with company contributions * fitness membership * And MORE!
If you have solid experience with a General Contractor as a commercial construction Estimator, we would like to meet with you! This role is primarily located at our main office in Englewood, CO.
ResponsibilitiesCompiles, reviews, analyzes, and quotes project materials, labor, equipment, data, environmental factors, and overall costs for commercial construction projects.Manages the bid process, bid pricing, preparing cost analysis, and providing timely completion of estimates. Also supports and assists as needed with projects assigned to the greater Estimating and Preconstruction Team.Prepares technical evaluations, cost estimating draft reports, memos, and letters and presents recommendations to management.Develops, provides and communicates cost estimating on all assigned projects utilizing alternate delivery method contracts when necessary.Accurately and thoroughly forecasts costs of future projects as well as changes to existing projects while also developing timely estimates for each design deliverable at each phase of design development.Delivers and develops pre-planning and conceptual estimates. This includes providing accurate estimates within the guaranteed maximum price (GMP) using the allotted project timeframe for completion and project specifications.Establishes working relationships with project owners, subcontractors, suppliers and vendors while reviewing and explaining project estimates as necessary. 
QualificationsBachelor’s degree in construction management or closely related discipline and 3 to 5 years of construction experience with a General Contractor or 5 to 8 years of experience in construction estimating for a General Contractor with no degree.Ability to consistently deliver accurate and thorough estimates while setting realistic expectations of the company’s ability to deliver construction services.Demonstrated experience delivering pre-planning and conceptual estimates as well as accurately and thoroughly forecasting costs.Proven ability to compile, review, analyze and quote project costs while effectively managing the full cycle bid process.Thorough understanding of bidding different contract types - lump sum, GMP, unit price, etc.Experienced in construction layout, blueprint and shop drawing readings.Must possess technical understandings of architectural, civil, structural, mechanical, electrical and plumbing disciplines. Must be computer literate and proficient in MS Office skills including Word, Excel, Power Point and Outlook.Possess strong communication and sales skills to secure a client agreement or service.Excellent time management, problem solving, decision making, human relations, presentation and organizational skills.Ability to work under tight deadlines.Understand and respect the importance of confidentiality.Valid Driver’s License.Must be eligible to work in the US without sponsorship.
Our Values include Integrity, Leadership and Equity, and we are looking for like-minded individuals to join our team! You can learn more about us at www.WHITECG.COM and on our social media pages. WCG Construction is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): None
